section.name: UNIT 1: COURSE INTRODUCTION
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 1: Course Introduction.

In today's society, science plays an increasingly pivotal role in shaping our lives, our industries, and the global community. Science is connected to discovery and innovation, and educators can support the development of connections to the hearts and minds of our learners too, regardless of their age or educational background.

After completing this unit, you will be able to explain how you currently integrate science into your classroom instruction.

Please allow approximately 15 minutes to complete this unit. However, you are free to leave the unit at any time.

Select the Unit 1 link below to complete the introductory activities for the course.
